title: Appointment of Officers to the Higher Management of the General Treasury
decision_details:
- As per a proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Development, Policy Formulation, Planning and Tourism, approval of the Cabinet was granted to make the following appointments:
* to appoint Mr.H.C.D.L Silva, Special Grade Officer of the Sri Lanka Accountants' Service, presently serving as the Director General of the Department of Treasury Operations, as a Deputy Secretary to the Treasury.
* to appoint Mr.D.A.P Abeysekara, Special Grade Officer of the Sri Lanka Planning Service, presently serving as the Director General of the Department of External Resources, to a post of Deputy Secretary to the Treasury which falls vacant on 2024‑11‑06, after the retirement of Mr.R.M.P Ratnayake, presently serving in the said post.
* to appoint Mr.A.N Hapugala, a Special Grade Officer of the  Sri Lanka Accountants' Service, presently serving as the Additional Director General of the Department of Public Finance, to the post of Director General of the Department of Treasury Operations which falls vacant due to the appointment of Mr. H.C.D.L Silva as a Deputy Secretary to the Treasury.
* to appoint Mr. N.S.M.P Ranjith, Special Grade Officer of the Sri Lanka Planning Service, presently serving as the Acting Director General of the Department of Project Management and Monitoring, as the Director General of the said Department.
* to appoint Mrs. J.M.S.D Ratnayake, Special Grade Officer of the Sri Lanka Planning Service, presently serving as the Additional Director General of the Department of National Planning to the currently vacant post of Director General of the said Department.
